mapper.insert: INSERT INTO main_categrp(m_categrpno, name, seqno, visible, rdate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(m_categrpno), 0) + 1 as m_categrpno FROM main_categrp), #{name}, #{seqno}, #{visible}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT m_categrpno, name, seqno, visible, rdate FROM main_categrp ORDER BY seqno ASC
